verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7181>give<s%> <S%H7181>attention<s%> to my <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> <S%H5186>Incline<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to my <S%H8394>understanding;<s%>
That you may <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H4209>discretion,<s%> And your <S%H8193>lips<s%> may <S%H5341>reserve<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
For the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of an <S%H2114>adulteress<s%> <S%H5197>drip<s%> <S%H5317>honey,<s%> And <S%H2509>smoother<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> is her <S%H2441>speech;<s%>
But in the <S%H319>end<s%> she is <S%H4751>bitter<s%> as <S%H3939>wormwood,<s%> <S%H2299>Sharp<s%> as a two-edged <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
Her <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4194>death,<s%> Her <S%H6806>steps<s%> <S%H8551>lay<s%> <S%H8551>hold<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>
She does not <S%H6424>ponder<s%> the <S%H734>path<s%> of <S%H9132>life;<s%> Her <S%H4570>ways<s%> are <S%H5128>unstable,<s%> she does not <S%H3045>know<s%> [it].
<S%H6258>Now<s%> then, [my] <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me, And do not <S%H5493>depart<s%> from the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
<S%H7368>Keep<s%> your <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from her, And do not <S%H7126>go<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of her <S%H1004>house,<s%>
<S%H6435>Lest<s%> you <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1935>vigor<s%> to <S%H312>others,<s%> And your <S%H8141>years<s%> to the <S%H394>cruel<s%> <S%H394>one;<s%>
<S%H6435>Lest<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> be <S%H7646>filled<s%> with your <S%H3581>strength,<s%> And your hard-earned <S%H6089>goods<s%> [go] to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of an <S%H5237>alien;<s%>
And you <S%H5098>groan<s%> at your <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H319>end,<s%> When your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and your <S%H7607>body<s%> are <S%H3615>consumed;<s%>
And you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H349>"How<s%> I have <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H4148>instruction!<s%> And my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5006>spurned<s%> <S%H9640>reproof!<s%>
"And I have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H4175>teachers,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> <S%H5186>inclined<s%> my <S%H241>ear<s%> to my <S%H3925>instructors!<s%>
"I was <S%H4592>almost<s%> in <S%H3605>utter<s%> <S%H9563>ruin<s%> In the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> and <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>"
<S%H8354>Drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> from your own <S%H953>cistern,<s%> And <S%H5140>fresh<s%> <S%H5140>water<s%> from your own <S%H875>well.<s%>
Should your <S%H4599>springs<s%> be <S%H6327>dispersed<s%> <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> <S%H6388>Streams<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets<s%>?
Let them be yours <S%H905>alone,<s%> And not for <S%H2114>strangers<s%> with you.
Let your <S%H4726>fountain<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed,<s%> And <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H802>wife<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

[As] a <S%H158>loving<s%> <S%H355>hind<s%> and a <S%H2580>graceful<s%> <S%H3280>doe,<s%> Let her <S%H1717>breasts<s%> <S%H7301>satisfy<s%> you at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>times;<s%> Be <S%H7686>exhilarated<s%> <S%H8548>always<s%> with her <S%H160>love.<s%>
For <S%H4100>why<s%> should you, my <S%H1121>son,<s%> be <S%H7686>exhilarated<s%> with an <S%H2114>adulteress,<s%> And <S%H2263>embrace<s%> the <S%H2436>bosom<s%> of a <S%H5237>foreigner<s%>?
For the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> are <S%H5227>before<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And He <S%H6424>watches<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4570>paths.<s%>
His own <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> will <S%H3920>capture<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> And he will be <S%H8551>held<s%> with the <S%H9112>cords<s%> of his <S%H9128>sin.<s%>
He will <S%H4191>die<s%> for <S%H369>lack<s%> of <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> And in the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of his <S%H200>folly<s%> he will <S%H7686>go<s%> <S%H7686>astray.<s%>
